name: Pico (PixelHole)
description:
Pico. 

A game where you play as a person who is using a new operating system in late 1990's but gets in a lot of trouble.

You will play a series of games in the Pico operating system or PicoOS to remove a virus from his system

Controls

  • when you see a grey circle around a object, hold SPACE to interact with it
  • Use ARROW KEYS or WASD to navigate through the menu
  • Press SPACE to select
  • Press F to switch Fullscreen
  • Press T in the menu to save

Originaly i designed this game to raise awareness about the threats of data piracy through social engineering. This is a serious problem in todays world, people with zero to no knowledge of hacking or programming in general, manage to steal personal data from users of any platform

Maybe the story i told through this game is vage and unclear but please take my point from this description.  Be careful while entering personal info in the internet
